item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Experimental release of GrapheneOS for Pixel 9a (48 points | 12 comments)
2. Nice Things with SVG (328 points | 51 comments)
3. BPS is a GPS alternative that nobody's heard of (32 points | 6 comments)
4. Anubis Works (123 points | 62 comments)
5. YAML: The Norway Problem (2022) (60 points | 21 comments)
6. WebTUI – A CSS Library That Brings the Beauty of Terminal UIs to the Browser (35 points | 4 comments)
7. Emacs Lisp Elements (193 points | 24 comments)
8. Show HN: memEx, a personal knowledge base inspired by zettlekasten and org-mode (102 points | 12 comments)
9. Open source and self hostable/private file converter (448 points | 86 comments)
10. CERN releases report on the feasibility of a possible Future Circular Collider (68 points | 44 comments)
11. Why is there a "small house" in IBM's Code page 437? (74 points | 23 comments)
12. Tunarr: Create and configure live TV channels from media on your servers (156 points | 39 comments)
13. Ambient music on iOS 18.4 and the return to the Apple's Music app (7 points | 5 comments)
14. ArkType: Ergonomic TS validator 100x faster than Zod (115 points | 40 comments)
15. Shadertoys Ported to Rust GPU (50 points | 17 comments)
16. Show HN: AI quiz generator from any topic or book in seconds (8 points | 7 comments)
17. How to Structure a B2B Marketplace Venture (7 points | discuss)
18. Mammoth genetic diversity throughout the last million years (14 points | 1 comment)
19. Zod v4 Beta (123 points | 27 comments)
20. Hunger shifts attention towards less healthy food options, study finds (25 points | 5 comments)
21. Learning Assembly for Fun, Performance and Profit (32 points | 4 comments)
22. Battle of the Mallocators (15 points | 2 comments)
23. Artie (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #3 ( | hide)
24. Trump exempts phones, computers, chips from 'reciprocal' tariffs (185 points | 458 comments)
25. Rebuilding Prime Video UI with Rust and WebAssembly (105 points | 28 comments)
26. Ask HN: How do you monetize personal code if it's not an "app"? (90 points | 33 comments)
27. New urinal designs prevent 265,000 gallons of urine splashing onto the floor (58 points | 66 comments)
28. The 5 levels of configuration languages (33 points | 37 comments)
29. Google will let companies run Gemini models in their own data centers (461 points | 169 comments)
30. Apache ECharts + Leaflet + shadcn for data viz (48 points | 7 comments)
